entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:42 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
